$schema.description: The schema to verify this document against.

data.description: List of locations for this apworld

name.description: The unique name of the location.

category.description: (Optional) A list of categories to be applied to this location.

requires.description: (Optional) A boolean logic string that describes the required items, counts, etc. needed to reach this location.

region.description: (Optional) The name of the region this location is part of.

place_item.description: (Optional) Places an item that matches one of the item names listed in this setting at this location. Does not check logical access to the location.

dont_place_item.description: (Optional) Configures what item names should not end up at this location during normal generation. Does not check logical access to the location.

place_item_category.description: (Optional) Places an item that matches at least one of the categories listed in this setting at this location. Does not check logical access to the location.

dont_place_item_category.description: (Optional) Configures what item categories should not end up at this location during normal generation. Does not check logical access to the location.

victory.description: (Optional) Is this location one of the possible goals of this Manual APWorld?

prehint.description: (Optional) Should this location be hinted at the start?

hint_entrance.description: (Optional) Adds additional text to this location's hints to convey useful information. Typically used for entrance randomization.

id.description:
(Optional) Skips the item ID forward to the given value.
This can be used to provide buffer space for future items.

comment.description: (Optional) Does nothing, Its mainly here for Dev notes for future devs to understand your logic
